sources.title: Flaming Frontiers (1938) 15-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGERüçïJOHNNY MACK BROWN
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 15-chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Johnny Mack Brown, Eleanor Hansen, Jack Rutherford
Directors:  Ray Taylor & Alan James
After rescuing a dog, tangling with some Indians, and taking over the mail pouch of a mortally wounded Pony Express rider, famous scout Tex Houston arrives in Plainsville, where he finds that the father and sister of his friend are in serious trouble. 
üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Intro
01:09     CHAPTER 1:  The River Runs Red
22:36     CHAPTER 2:  Death Rides the Wind
43:12     CHAPTER 3:  Treachery at Eagle Pass
1:02:02  CHAPTER 4:  A Night of Terror
1:20:25  CHAPTER 5:  Blood and Gold
1:41:34  CHAPTER 6:  Trapped by Fire 
2:02:34  CHAPTER 7:  The Human Target
2:23:54  CHAPTER 8:  The Savage Horde
2:41:19  CHAPTER 9:  Toll of the Torrent 
3:01:06  CHAPTER 10: In The Claws of the Cougar
3:20:25  CHAPTER 11: The Half-Breed's Revenge
3:39:54  CHAPTER 12: The Indians are Coming
3:58:42  CHAPTER 13: The Fatal Plunge
4:19:11  CHAPTER 14: Dynamite
4:39:22  CHAPTER 15: A Duel to the Death
4:57:15  Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: Tom Grant has found a rich gold vein and Bart Eaton is after it. Tom's sister Mary heads for the gold fields and Eaton and his men follow. Eaton teams up with Ace Daggett who plans to doublecross him and get the gold for himself. They frame Tom for murder and then try to get him to sign over his claim. The famous scout Tex Houston is on hand, escaping the attempts on his life, saving Mary from various perils, and trying to bring in the real killer and clear Tom.
metadata.Writer: Peter B. Kyne, Wyndham Gittens, George H. Plympton
metadata.Actors: Johnny Mack Brown, Eleanor Hansen, John Archer
